```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidymodels)
library(dlookr)
tidymodels_prefer()
train <- read_csv("../data/train_clean.csv")
train <- train[3:ncol(train)]
features <- colnames(train)[2:ncol(train)]
```

```{r}
describe(train)
normality(train) %>%
  arrange(desc(p_value))
```

Correlations

```{r}
correlate(train) %>%
  arrange(coef_corr) %>%
  slice(which(row_number() %% 2 == 1))
correlate(train) %>%
  arrange(desc(coef_corr))  %>%
  slice(which(row_number() %% 2 == 1))
```

Features

```{r}
for (i in 1:40) {
  plot(relate(target_by(train, dem), features[i]))
}
```
